location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the last folio with 503; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains an Administrative Report and ten Annual Reports issued by the Government of Bahrain for the period 1926-46, with a small quantity of interspersed India Office covering letters, minutes and correspondence. The reports bear manuscript annotations.The file includes the following reports:'Government of Bahrain Administrative Report for the Years 1926-1937''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1356 (March 1937 - February 1938)''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1357 (March 1938 - February 1939)''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1358 (February 1939 - February 1940)''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1359 (February 1940 - February 1941)''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1360 (January 1941 - February 1942)''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1361 (February 1942 - January 1943)''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1362 (January 1943 - December 1943)''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1363 (January 1944 - December 1944)''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1364 (January 1945 - December 1945)''Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1365 (December 1945 - November 1946)'.The correspondence includes letters dated May 1941 from the Political Agent, Bahrain (Reginald George Evelyn William Alban) and the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf (Lieutenant-Colonel Charles Geoffrey Prior) commenting on the causes of public disaffection in Bahrain and discontent with the local administration (folios 319-327); and a further letter from Prior dated 1945 concerning allowances made to the ruling family of Bahrain (folios 19-22).Folios 3-26 are minutes and correspondence dated 1942-47, and are not in chronological order.The file includes a divider, which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
